name: Downhill Bike Simulator 3D: Offroad Race
description:
Emerge into the atmosphere of downhill mountain bike contest! Face the dirt and feel the speed! Prove yourself as a real mountain bike champion with Downhill Bike Simulator 3D: Offroad Race!

Race through the dirt, avoid obstacles and perform different stunts! Challenge other racers and do your best to win the ride! Use all your driving skills to jump over rocks and roots, hold the balance to prevent disgraceful failing and have fun! Enjoy the race and feel free to do what you want on the trek! Earn points for impressive tricks to improve your bike or to buy a new one – it would help you to become the fastest stunt rider at this racing!

Check two different modes of a game! Ride as fast as you can to pass the trek as a leader of the race, or try to collect all checkpoints before the time limit ends! Feel each stretch of a trek, avoid rocks, roots, and other obstacles, perform impressive tricks and huge jumps - be a real downhill master! Ride on your mighty bike through hills and swamps, join the motocross tournament with Downhill Bike Simulator 3D: Offroad Race!

Downhill Bike Simulator 3D: Offroad Race features:

- Thrilling atmosphere of a mountain bike racing contest!
- Varies bikes, bike upgrades, and investments
- Two game modes – try to get the best time or to collect more points before the end of time limit!
- Easy and intuitive controls!
- Amazing 3D-graphics

Do your best to prove that you are the most intense and competitive biker! Clear the visor of your helmet, start your bike and ride on! Have the ride of your life with Downhill Bike Simulator 3D: Offroad Race game!
